level.heading: Open solid waste facilities prohibited.
level.text: No person shall operate an open solid waste facility in the District.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-1051.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-94, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-1051.
